segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how she doesn't notice the water overflowing all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just gushing water, and it's spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, but she seems completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's just really focused or maybe she's just had a long day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids behind her are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't make too much of a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how precarious that stool looks!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're going to get away with it, the woman is so distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
